# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Thu Feb 19, 2026 2:04 PM ET

## 🔴 CRITICAL

### Iran Military Standoff — 10 Day Ultimatum
Trump told his Board of Peace that the world will know "in the next 10 days" whether a deal with Iran is reached or the US "takes it a step further." USS Abraham Lincoln carrier strike group is already near Iranian waters. USS Gerald R Ford (world's largest warship) heading east through the Med. All US forces expected in position by mid-March. Reports Trump discussed attack options with advisers — strike could come as soon as Saturday. Last summer the US struck 3 Iranian nuclear facilities.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c86yjnw4x49o

### UK Denies US Permission to Use RAF Bases for Iran Strikes
UK has NOT given US permission to use RAF Fairford or Diego Garcia for Iran operations. Trump posted on Truth Social that it "may be necessary" to use these bases. This signals the strike planning is serious and Trump is pressuring allies publicly.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cj98egkl7l1o

### Iran May Choose Confrontation Over Surrender
Analysis suggests Iran views US demands (end enrichment, reduce missile range, drop proxy networks) as dismantling its entire security architecture. Tehran is fortifying military sites. Khamenei posted AI image of USS Gerald R Ford sunk on X. Iran running naval drills in Strait of Hormuz. Russia conducting joint naval exercise with Iran in Sea of Oman.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cdr2g7420p4o

## 🟠 IMPORTANT

### Trump Admin Official Attacks Fed Independence Over Tariff Research
A top Trump administration official called for NY Fed staff to "be disciplined" for publishing research on tariffs. Minneapolis Fed President Kashkari called this the latest move to undermine central bank independence. Market-moving: threatens credibility of Fed data and independence.
- **Source:** Reuters via https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

### Trump BLS Nominee Proposes Ending Monthly Jobs Report
EJ Antoni, Trump's pick to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics, floated suspending the monthly jobs report — one of the most market-critical data releases. Trump fired the previous BLS commissioner after a weak jobs number, accusing her of "rigging" data. Economists on both sides slammed Antoni as error-prone.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/czerwl2xee4o

### Board of Peace: $7B Pledged for Gaza, Hamas Disarmament Talk
Trump announced $7B+ from Kazakhstan, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait and others for Gaza relief. Said it "looks like" Hamas will disarm (no evidence supports this). Board of Peace seen as potential UN replacement — Western allies (UK, France, Germany, Canada) have refused to join.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cp8rke05kv4o

### NIH Director Takes Over CDC — Health Dept Shakeup
Jay Bhattacharya (NIH Director, Trump appointee) will step in as acting CDC director, part of a broader HHS shakeup ahead of midterm elections.
- **Source:** Reuters

## 🟡 NOTABLE

### Trump Posts on Truth Social About Diego Garcia / RAF Bases
Trump used Truth Social to publicly pressure UK on military base access for potential Iran strikes, saying it "may be necessary" to use Diego Garcia and RAF Fairford. This is classic Trump negotiation-via-social-media.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cj98egkl7l1o

### Trump Nominates Lawyer from Immunity Case to Federal Bench
Trump nominated a lawyer who was on his legal team in the landmark presidential immunity Supreme Court case to serve as 8th Circuit Court judge.
- **Source:** Reuters

### G20 Finance Meetings Set for US — Late August
US will host G20 finance officials in Asheville, NC in late August/September. Treasury announced Thursday.
- **Source:** Reuters

### Trump UK State Visit Concluded — Warm but Limited Influence
Trump's UK state visit showed strong personal rapport with Starmer but limited UK ability to influence US policy. Trump was "beguiled" by royal treatment at Windsor Castle.
- **Source:** https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cgkn3key65do
